summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 5058 lux), and cloud levels (up 583 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1513 m), light levels (up 7341 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 583.2m lower than yesterday, 1070.0m lower than past week, 1512.5m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 860m to 3110m and averaged 1290.1m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air. Possible light showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
